div.head: 四肢煩冷
div.div: vexation and cold in the four limbs

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: vexation and cold in the four limbs

sense.def: Illness Sign of cold in the upper and lower extremities accompanied by a feeling of agitation. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry xiang ru 香薷：霍亂轉筋，煮飲服之，無不差者。若四肢煩 冷，汗出而渴者，加蓼子同切，煮飲 , “For cholera with twisted sinews, ingest it as a decoction, and not a single case will remain uncured. In the case of vexation and cold in the four limbs ; and when [the patient] sweats and is thirsty, cut it together with liao zi and boil a decoction”.
